mapper.select: SELECT t.name as table_name, db.name as db_name, u.name as username FROm sys_table as t, sys_database as db, sys_user as u where t.db_id = db.id and db.user_id = u.id and t.delete_time = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_table WHERE (delete_time != 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,delete_time, current_timestamp()) > #{expiredTimeLenS}) OR (db_id in (SELECT id FROM sys_database WHERE delete_time != 0))
